title: Goldman Sachs Clients Not Interested in Crypto, Says Chief Investment Officer: WSJ
description: Goldman Sachs, nowadays one of the few Wall Street banks to do so, isn’t backing away from its negative stance against crypto, as it doesn’t see the value of the asset itself.

title: Crypto Venture Capital Firm Paradigm Looking to Raise Up to $850M for New Fund: Bloomberg
description: The VC is looking to raise between $750 million and $850 million, Bloomberg reported citing source familiar.

title: 'You Can't Buy Culture': BNB Chain Offers $1 Million for Memes of Its Own
description: With its “Meme Innovation Battle,” BNB Chain is attempting to get a piece of the multi-billion dollar meme coin trend from other networks.

title: Emerging VR blockchain game 5th Scape sees strong ICO support
description: The new blockchain project 5th Scape (5SCAPE) surpasses $3.5 million in ICO funding, fueling speculation about its potential to reshape gaming. #partnercontent

title: Crypto flash crashes: what you need to know
description: A crypto clash crash is an unexpected, sudden, and brief market crash typically caused by algorithmic trading programs. What is a flash crash in crypto? In the crypto market, a ‘flash crash’ occurs when a crypto asset experiences a huge…

title: Ethereum’s Growing Network: Non-Zero Addresses ATH Sparks Speculation of $4,000 ETH Price
description: Ethereum price in the monthly time frame closed above the 2022 capitulation level, thus confirming the bulls are in control in the coming quarters. title: Moongate Raises $2.7 Million Seed Round To Develop a Modular Web 3.0 Engagement Layer for Real-World Activations
description:
April 2, 2024 – Hong Kong, Hong Kong Moongate announces the closing of a $2.7 million seed round to develop a modular Web 3.0 engagement layer for real-world activations. Backed by its success in disrupting the ticketing industry, the company aims to expand its reach into other sectors to transform interactive experiences using blockchain and […]
